verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump 's attorney Michael Cohen] [V: received] [ARG1: a secret payment of at least $ 400,000] [ARGM-PNC: in exchange for] [ARGM-TMP: arranging a June 2017 meeting for Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko]
[ARG0: President Trump 's attorney Michael Cohen] received a secret payment of at least $ 400,000 in exchange for [V: arranging] [ARG1: a June 2017 meeting for Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko]
